changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR ALTER VIEW FFF_REPORTING.TASK_IMPORT_TIMES AS SELECT TH.TASK_RUN_ID, TH.WORKFLOW_ID, T.ID AS TS_ID, LEN(T.FEWS_DATA) AS SIZE, TH.IMPORT_TIME, TH.TASK_COMPLETION_TIME, DATEDIFF(s, TH.TASK_COMPLETION_TIME, TH.IMPORT_TIME) AS STAGING_TIME, DATEDIFF(s, TH.IMPORT_TIME, TJ.JOB_STATUS_TIME) AS FME_QUEUE_TIME, TJ.ID AS JOB_ID, TJ.JOB_STATUS_TIME AS FME_START_TIME, TJ2.JOB_STATUS_TIME AS FME_END_TIME, DATEDIFF(s, TJ.JOB_STATUS_TIME, TJ2.JOB_STATUS_TIME) AS FME_PROCESS_TIME, TJ2.JOB_STATUS, TJ2.DESCRIPTION FROM FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES AS T INNER JOIN FFF_STAGING.TIMESERIES_HEADER AS TH ON T.TIMESERIES_HEADER_ID = TH.ID INNER JOIN FFF_REPORTING.TIMESERIES_JOB AS TJ ON T.ID = TJ.TIMESERIES_ID INNER JOIN FFF_REPORTING.TIMESERIES_JOB AS TJ2 ON TJ.TIMESERIES_ID = TJ2.TIMESERIES_ID WHERE TJ.JOB_STATUS = 1 AND TJ2.JOB_STATUS <> 1

rollback.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'FFF_REPORTING' AND TABLE_NAME = 'TASK_IMPORT_TIMES') DROP VIEW FFF_REPORTING.TASK_IMPORT_TIMES
